item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.name: Shard of True Ice
item1.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item2.name: Forbidden Idol
item2.description:
10% Heal and Shield Power
50% Base Mana Regen

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item4.name: Moonstone Renewer
item4.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item5.name: Amplifying Tome
item5.description: 20 Ability Power

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Forbidden Idol
item0.description:
10% Heal and Shield Power
50% Base Mana Regen

item1.name: Staff of Flowing Water
item1.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item2.name: Ardent Censer
item2.description:
60 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding an ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Tear of the Goddess
item3.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

perk0.name: Unsealed Spellbook
perk0.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
perk0.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item1.name: Redemption
item1.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
200 Health
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Intervention: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore 180 - 360 (scales with ally level) Health to allies and burn enemy champions for 10% max Health true damage (120s cooldown).

Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another Intervention. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item2.name: Moonstone Renewer
item2.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Chemtech Putrifier
item5.description:
50 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding an ally will cause their next damage to enemy champions to apply 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.

Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item3.name: Staff of Flowing Water
item3.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item4.name: Forbidden Idol
item4.description:
10% Heal and Shield Power
50% Base Mana Regen

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Moonstone Renewer
item2.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Faerie Charm
item3.description: 50% Base Mana Regen

item4.name: Control Ward
item4.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage
